Html:
Please help me to find a sample code in C# for converting UTM to MGRS or Lat/Lon to MGRS.

need very urgent.

thanks in advance.

I suggest you read the home page a little more and try the examples and build upon them.
It's really very simple.
i.e.
Geographic geo = new Geographic(lon, lat);
MGRS mgrs = (MGRS)geo;

But note that this conversion has bugs which have been raised.

rbdavison wrote:
I suggest you read the home page a little more and try the examples and build upon them.
It's really very simple.
i.e.
Geographic geo = new Geographic(lon, lat);
MGRS mgrs = (MGRS)geo;

But note that this conversion has bugs which have been raised.
Dear

Thank you for your fast reply.
it works great.

Yes the conversion process is lovely and simple.
I'd recommend that you test it very thoroughly.

Dear

also need UTM to lat/lon utility,

i have only UTM coordinate and wants to convert to lat/lon only.

But need very accurate one, because i am developing a very important software.

It seems very good utility, but need more documentation for use.

Thanks for your help.

Please read the home page and follow the patterns there.
It's really not hard to work out that this is what you need
UTM utm = new UTM(32, "U", 412345, 5567890);
MGRS mgrs = (MGRS)utm;

If you need accurate conversions then I don't think this library will to. At least my testing doesn't result in accurate conversions.

Of course you could assist the project and make the conversions more accurate.
